<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_otte2_creative_f_creative_requests</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_otte2_creative_f_creative_requests">u_send_approval=true^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_send_approval" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sysapproval</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

//Lookup approval
var approval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
approval.addQuery('source_table', 'x_otte2_creative_f_creative_requests');

approval.setLimit(1);
approval.query();

gs.addInfoMessage(approval.document_id);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ben.cleary</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-28 22:31:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>51a5bd8a877ad550f1edea8d8bbb3569</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sysapproval</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Creative Form" source="x_otte2_creative_f">138bbed41b921510756e9938b04bcb73</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Creative Form">138bbed41b921510756e9938b04bcb73</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_51a5bd8a877ad550f1edea8d8bbb3569</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ben.cleary</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-28 22:45:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>
